EmailTemplate.name: Email Template when B2B is Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Quote_Number__c} has been rejected by B2B Integration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.OwnerFullName} ,
This Email is to notify you that your Quote has been rejected by B2B Integration Team. Please review the notes below for reasons/next steps.
Thank you, Best regards, Office Depot B2B Integration.
